title: For these proposals, marginal distances (except front margin) parking and other requirement shall be as per Slum Redevelopment Regulations, wherever such regulations exist
clause_text: For these proposals, marginal distances (except front margin) parking and other requirement shall be as per Slum Redevelopment Regulations, wherever such regulations exist.
